      • Strategy

        public Strategy(scala.Enumeration.Value algo,
        Impurity impurity,
        int maxDepth,
        int numClassesForClassification,
        int maxBins,
        java.util.Map<Integer,Integer> categoricalFeaturesInfo)
        Java-friendly constructor.

        Parameters:
        algo - classification or regression
        impurity - criterion used for information gain calculation
        maxDepth - Maximum depth of the tree. E.g., depth 0 means 1 leaf node; depth 1 means 1 internal node + 2 leaf nodes.
        numClassesForClassification - number of classes for classification. Default value is 2 leads to binary classification
        maxBins - maximum number of bins used for splitting features
        categoricalFeaturesInfo - A map storing information about the categorical variables and the number of discrete values they take. For example, an entry (n -> k) implies the feature n is categorical with k categories 0, 1, 2, ... , k-1. It's important to note that features are zero-indexed.
